body.name: Puffs Ultra Soft Non-Lotion Facial Tissue (Old)
features: Pack includes 10 Cube Boxes (52 Tissues per Box) of Puffs Ultra Soft Facial Tissues
Soft, strong and fragrance-free tissues that contain no lotion
Each tissue has Puffs cushiony softness
Soft and 2x Stronger when wet vs. the leading national regular brand
Don't let your runny nose run out of Puffs. Sign up for automatic home delivery and save
Dermatologist tested to be gentle on skin
Don't irritate your nose during allergies; be ready with soothing Puffs Ultra Soft
body.description: Puffs is so soft, your nose knows the difference. Protect your nose from ordinary tissues by choosing Puffs and skipping the sore nose issues. Puffs Ultra Soft is our most comforting lotion-less facial tissue. It is the perfect tissue for when sore or runny noses need some extra non-lotion softness. Puffs Ultra Soft non-lotion facial tissues are gentle and offer the softness and strength your delicate nose needs, especially during allergy season. A nose in need deserves Puffs indeed!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Puffs Tissues That Pack Softness Perfect for Any Use Puffs Ultra Soft is always ready for colds, allergies, runny noses, or even intense sneezes. The combination of softness and strength make them perfect for any use. Soothing Softness Unlike other tissues that are rolled flat when made, Puffs Ultra Soft tissues have more pillowy softness to cushion every blow. Lotion-Free and Fragrance-Free Puffs Ultra Soft is perfect for when sore or sensitive noses need some extra non-lotion softness without fragrance.
Designs to Fit Your Life Puffs Ultra Soft cube and family size boxes always look their best, no matter where you put them or which one you get.
Designs to Fit Your Life Puffs Ultra Soft cube and family size boxes always look their best, no matter where you put them or which one you get.

Puffs' Sustainability Promise Fully Recyclable Boxes We are committed to helping communities, wildlife and forests thrive. Puffs Supports Reforestation We only source fiber from plantations and working forests – land carefully managed to provide a steady, renewable supply of wood for the thousands of items people use every day. Made with American Jobs Puffs is proudly manufactured in the USA. 100% of Puffs products are made with American jobs that support thousands of employees and their families. Puffs Protects Forests Puffs tissues are proudly made with pulp from well-managed, FSC certified forests and other controlled material, respecting workers and indigenous Peoples while protecting wildlife habitats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The softness was just what my sore nose needed.
reviews.reviewText: I have extremely bad allergies! The softness and absorbency is just what I needed. I love the size of the box, it fits great in small spaces, and doesn't take up a lot of room on my end table. This was a very good purchase and I am happy I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fav brand of facial tissue
reviews.reviewText: Have used it for years, since Consumer Reports first top-rated it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I suggest not using USPS for delivery. It was stuck! Took me awhile to remove it from box 😡

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Store them at home!
reviews.reviewText: I was so glad when my Puffs order came! I could finally relax and have a tissue whenever I wanted! Puffs is my favorite because its soft and never irritating! Ten in one order is good!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Condition of boxes
reviews.reviewText: I loved the product but inside some the boxes of Puffs were kind of crushedAnd a couple of the boxes opened,Not packed well. Never received a shipment like that. Not returning, just needed Amazon to know. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Can't get just one!
reviews.reviewText: These are decently soft enough I suppose and two ply as stated. They do tear pretty easily. Mine came in a full 10 pack complete with plastic seal. However, the packaging process of the tissue leaves a little bit to be desired. Specifically the ability to get the single tissues OUT of the box. I've used 8 of these so far and almost ever single box has at least one point throughout it's usage where it will just stop pulling the next tissue up. There is then no fold or crease to grab onto to get the next one out easily, so you end up having to dig your way into the box and pull up a bunch at once. First world problems, I know. But I've been using tissues for a long time now and I've never seen this issue occur so often as with this batch. Also, I've found several small little bits and pieces of 1/4 tissue strands that look like they were part of a machine malfunction at the factory. So maybe it's just all a QC issue that will be resolved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than other brand
reviews.reviewText: I like Puffs the best as far as softness and value. Like that I can buy multiples because we keep on in every room and car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Love this particular kind of Puffs but hard to find near me. I was worried about having tissue boxes delivered, as they wouldn't be something I'd want to sit around my house if they were crushed. The ones I ordered were prepacked by Puffs and ready to ship. Not a scratch on them.
